item.title: Shouting into the void?
item.author: larry@wapnitsky.com (Larry G. Wapnitsky)
item.description: It’s almost a year since I’ve posted. Going to restart, really, but who’s going to pay attention?

item.title: The slacker's health update
item.author: larry@wapnitsky.com (Larry G. Wapnitsky)
item.description: I haven’t posted in month, even though I said I’d be more on the ball. Why? Keep reading…

item.title: Why have I been so quiet?
item.author: larry@wapnitsky.com (Larry G. Wapnitsky)
item.description: I know I said I’d post more, but there’s been a lot going on since the last post…
